thread.section_title: AnaJet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AnaJet | anajet.com
thread.title: Christopher Bright

author: Christopher Bright
title: Christopher Bright
text:
I have nothing but great things to say about Anajet. I started almost three years ago with a MP5i and the rest is history. Since then I am now self-employed and looking to upgrade to a MP10 VERY SOON through a the help of my tremendous Sales Rep Shawn Stender.
From Anajet I receive reliable customer and tech care along with a dependable machine that allows me to meet the needs of my customers. If ever I get in a jam, Deanna L never hesitates to ensure I get what I need to continue Business an normal. I would recommend anyone interested to give Anajet a try and not be swayed by negative feedback. If you take care of your machine, it will take care of you!
